sentences.en: Bring a sleeping bag and foam mat.
He buttocked his opponent onto the mat.
sentences.cn: 他把对手背摔在垫子上.

sentences.en: My foot caught in the mat and I fell heavily.
sentences.cn: 我被席子绊了一下,重重地摔了一跤.

sentences.en: Please wipe your feet on the mat.
Please wipe your shoes on the mat.
sentences.cn: 请在蹭鞋垫子上擦擦鞋.

sentences.en: She touched the thick mat of sandy hair on his chest.
sentences.cn: 她摸着他那浓密的淡棕色胸毛。

sentences.en: The houses are well spaced out, each on its own plot of ground and mat of coarse grass.
sentences.cn: 房屋稀稀疏疏地坐落着，每栋都有自己的一片地和粗草坪。

sentences.en: The mat was smouldering where the burning log had fallen.
sentences.cn: 燃烧的木棒落下的地方垫子慢慢燃烧起来.

sentences.en: The relatively short [ A ] of mat and the relatively long [ A ] of mad are allophones.
sentences.cn: 单词mat中较短的 [ A ] 和 单词 mad中较长的A是音素的变形.

sentences.en: There was a letter on the mat.
This mat has to be hammered down at the edges.
sentences.cn: 必须把这张席子的边钉上.

sentences.en: We must glue the mat down at the edges to stop it curling.
sentences.cn: 我们必须把席子的边粘住,免得卷边.

sentences.en: We shall have frost tonight, don't forget to cover up the cabbages with the mat.
sentences.cn: 今天夜里有霜冻, 别忘了用席子把白菜苫好.

sentences.en: Wipe your feet on the mat before you come in, please.
sentences.cn: 请在垫子上擦擦脚再进来。

sentences.en: Wipe your feet on the mat.
sentences.cn: 在地垫上蹭蹭你的鞋底。

words.tran_cn: 铺席子的；纠缠的；暗淡的，无光泽的
纠缠在一起；铺席于…上；使…无光泽（mat的ing形式）
使…无光；把…熔炼为锍（等于matte）

trans.tran_cn: 席子，垫子，（体育运动用的）厚垫子，衬边，团，簇
trans.tran_en: a small piece of thick rough material which covers part of a floor
to tangle or weave or become tangled or woven into a dense mass
